name: Last & Furious
description:
A top-down racing game featuring two physics modes, wonky collision system and hastily set up opponent AI.

Originally created in November 2017 using Adventure Game Studio.  Ported to XAGE in August 2019.

Controls:  Arrow keys - accelerate, steer, brake.

Physics:  When starting new race choose between "Safe" and "Wild" physics mode.  It is also possible to disable car-vs-car collisions (they still collide with walls).

Credits:

  • Code - Crimson Wizard (original AGS Source Code)
  • Art - Jim Reed
  • Music
    • "Car Theft 101" by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)
    • "Welcome to the Show" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com).
  • Port to XAGE - Dan Alexander
